InputKey

typedef struct {
  KeyState state;
  uint     down_count;
  uint     up_count;
} InputKey;
type: C struct

Mouse

typedef struct {
  int      x;
  int      y;
  InputKey button_left;
  InputKey button_right;
  InputKey button_middle;
  int      wheel;
} Mouse;
type: C struct

Keyboard

typedef struct {
  InputKey keys[VIRTUAL_KEY_COUNT];
} Keyboard;
type: C struct

InputEvent

typedef struct {
  InputDeviceType device_type;
  uint            device;
  InputEventType  type;
  uint64          data;
} InputEvent;
type: C struct
